metadata.description: From Chris Claremont, writer of The Uncanny X-Men, Excalibur, and Fantastic Four, and John Bolton, artist of Man-Bat, Shame: Conception, and Books of Magic, comes the unforgettable tale of the beautiful, star-haired swordswoman, Marada the She-Wolf: Warrior. Daughter of Rome. Killer of Wizards!
metadata.name: Marada the She-Wolf
